aboutSection.title: Built for businesses, developers and other users.
aboutSection.paragraph: Our goal is to create a platform that anyone can use, whether they are a programmer, businessman, or regular user who wants to keep their files on external servers

forDevelopers.title: From developers for developers!
forDevelopers.description: If you are a developer looking for the cheapest VPS on the market, our platform is for you.

specialists.title: Our team of specialists
specialists.description: We have a specialized team that will help you if any complications arise.

security.title: Security
security.description: We have strong security measures so you can sleep peacefully.

contact.title: Need help? Write to us!
contact.description: Our team will respond to you as soon as possible. You will receive a response to your email inbox

newsletter.title: Subscribe to our newsletter
newsletter.description: To be the first to know about new updates!
newsletter.spamNotice: If you don't see our emails, they may be in your spam folder

items.title: Security and Isolation
items.paragraph: We use containerization and the latest sandboxing techniques to ensure complete resource isolation and security of your data.

items.title: Access to Computing Power
items.paragraph: Share and use computing power for complex tasks such as 3D graphics rendering, machine learning, or data analysis.

items.title: Latest Technologies
items.paragraph: We use the latest technologies to provide users with a secure and modern environment.

items.title: Decentralized Network
items.paragraph: We operate on a decentralized architecture where user resources are distributed and managed across the network. This eliminates single points of failure and increases the reliability of the entire platform â€“ without using blockchain.

items.title: Flexibility and Scalability
items.paragraph: RyzeSpace allows for dynamic resource scaling depending on your needs, offering flexibility unattainable in traditional models.

items.title: Free and Open-Source
items.paragraph: Using our platform is free and you can find the code on our GitHub

hero.title: RyzeSpace - Your Server Investment
hero.description: RyzeSpace - a platform for exchanging server resources where you decide how much you want to buy or sell

video.title: Exclusive presentation of our platform
video.description: See how we are revolutionizing the server industry. This presentation will change your approach to IT infrastructure.
